character_schedule.morning: Reexamine hippocampal signal readings; puzzle over non-uniform distribution.
character_schedule.afternoon: Consult microbiologist about Higgs shielding improvements; receive no useful advice.
character_schedule.evening: Exercise after seeing a lingerie commercial that motivated her.

user_schedule.morning: Analyze Kurisu’s role in challenging the “tsundere scientist” trope—compare her to other female characters from similar genres.
user_schedule.afternoon: Discuss findings with grad students who suggest including data from anime surveys and viewer polls.
user_schedule.evening: Reflect on her own teenage years and how seeing Kurisu helped her feel less alone as a young woman interested in STEM.

relationship: After spending some time together, they gradually get to know each other's personalities, interests, and habits. Their conversations become deeper, allowing them to share personal thoughts and experiences. Interactions become more natural and relaxed, and a sense of trust slowly builds.
